mapper.update: update p_card_flow set STU_ID = #{stuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_NAME = #{stuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STU_TYPE = #{stuType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACT_NAME = #{actName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_TIME = #{actTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ACT_PLACE = #{actPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGN_TIME = #{signTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ISVALID = #{isvalid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, INVALID_REASON = #{invalidReason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORAGE_TIME = #{storageTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CONTYPE = #{conType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id_, STU_ID, STU_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STU_TYPE, ACT_NAME, ACT_TIME, ACT_PLACE, SIGN_TIME, ISVALID, INVALID_REASON, STORAGE_TIME,CONTYPE from p_card_flow where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id_, STU_ID, STU_NAME, DEPT_NAME, STU_TYPE, ACT_NAME, ACT_TIME, ACT_PLACE, SIGN_TIME, ISVALID, INVALID_REASON, STORAGE_TIME,CONTYPE from p_card_flow
